attributes.action: Remove John Reid from his post as Home Secretary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove John Reid from his post as Home Secretary and replace him with someone who isn't a) thick b) so far out of touch with voters that a chimp would be an improvement c) someone who isn't going to spout a load of crap to appease voters, only to then do absolutely nothing apart from eat pies. Thankyou. Viva la revolution

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
